Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to produce a DuckDB SQL query that returns all events except those from cases that have the specific sequence and the time diff more than 5 days. Steps find cases with that sequence in direct succession no other events between. Since we have timestamps we can order by timestamp per case. Need to ensure consecutive rows have those activities.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Approach Use window functions to get lead lag. For each event we can check if activity equals Approve Purchase Requisition and lead 1 activity equals Create Order and lead 2 activity equals Confirm Order for same case and also ensure no other events in between by definition of lead. Then compute time diff between lead 1 timestamp and lead 2 timestamp more than interval 5 day.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Select case ids that satisfy. Then final query select star from event log where case id not in select case id from .... Ensure we exclude all events of those cases.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
